---
title: "Syntax Extensions"

This section documents syntax extensions and features specific to `quarto-markdown`.

## Work in Progress

The features documented here are currently under development. The syntax and behavior may change as we refine the implementation.

## Available Features

- [Definition Lists](definition-lists.qmd) - Create definition lists using an embedded markdown DSL
- [Footnotes](footnotes.qmd) - Add footnotes with inline or fenced block syntax
